Articles.Content: They've been great with them for a while.. where is this weeks one... ?
They come out every tuesday...
Ah ok! Jumping the gun I am...

I'm already more than halfway through Tuesday

(Wait several hours.)
Tuesday afternoon EST I believe

You didn't read the dev post the login servers are going down around 12 est only the players currently logged in to KSP will get the update this week. they said they didn't want to release the whole update to everyone all at once in case of game breaking bugs
Please don't spread false information, Oxytropis
It's Wednesday for Western-Europe...

That face is so unnerving!

I think there's quite a big body of expectation about 0.21 dropping today, I guess it would make sense to time a new KSP weekly with some accompanying news (just like a press release!), but I'm not holding my breath, just in case

That face is so unnerving!

I think there's quite a big body of expectation about 0.21 dropping today, I guess it would make sense to time a new KSP weekly with some accompanying news (just like a press release!), but I'm not holding my breath, just in case

That's what they did last time (and the time before too if I remember correctly). I'm actually getting a small tingly spidey sense it's coming today

That's what they did last time (and the time before too if I remember correctly). I'm actually getting a small tingly spidey sense it's coming today

Well, if you're getting it too, maybe I will hold my breath....*deep breath*

It's Wednesday for Western-Europe...

Wait no, it's not wednesday here in europe. Liar!

Edited July 23, 2013 by Blade_N
Lost in time x2

Wait no, it's not wednesday here in europe. Liar!

I think he meant that the Weekly Update comes out on Wednesday, which isn't right either as it usually comes out at about 8 or 9 on Tuesday for me.

Well, if you're getting it too, maybe I will hold my breath....*deep breath*

Yea I had the same feeling that tis might be the day. lets hope where right.
The updates come out no later than 5pm EST on Tuesdays...I would not expect it before then. It is hard to say what they would have to show us that is not already common knowledge by now though....
Around mid-morning Wednesday here in Aus. Because we live in the future, and all that.

I don't know where you come from Tom, but here in Belgium - and I like to think it's pretty western on the Europe map, it's still tuesday.

are you visiting from the future? do you got a magic DeLorean?

Australia. In my info thing below my name.

Also, I was meaning when the news thing comes out, but it's almost wednesday here now, anyway.

That's what they did last time (and the time before too if I remember correctly). I'm actually getting a small tingly spidey sense it's coming today

I was expecting it to drop after the ksptv marathon this weekend and was disappointed. I am guessing there are a lot of issues that are being hammered out yet, hopefully we get it this month yet.
comes out between 9 and 10pm for me on Tuesdays. Guessing this one is going to be about bugs they've found in testing.

I'm pretty sure there won't be anything interesting regarding game updates other than that 0.21 is coming "in very little time" and they're still, or almost done fixing bugs, so don't get your hopes high.

So the weekly is late? So it's come to this at last. I suggest panic and looting. And gentlemen, someone has to say it; it's time to start cannibalizing the older and sicker forum members. Please forward my messages to my survival bunker, where I will be in constant contact with President Obama.

Please forward my messages to my survival bunker, where I will be in constant contact with President Obama.

Commie. You will be reported to Senator McKerthy.

So the weekly is late? So it's come to this at last. I suggest panic and looting. And gentlemen, someone has to say it; it's time to start cannibalizing the older and sicker forum members. Please forward my messages to my survival bunker, where I will be in constant contact with President Obama.
Your join date looks very delicious.
